Activity: Log in to the EHR system, check emails regarding ongoing data collection efforts, and review the previous week's data entries for any inaccuracies.
Meet with @Data Analyst (da-2) to discuss data collection processes and identify any discrepancies noted during the review.
Perform data entry tasks while ensuring high accuracy. Focus on entering patient information related to seasonal influenza.
Review completed data entries for accuracy and completeness.
Continue data entry tasks and resolve any discrepancies found during the entry process.
